channel.title: Corporate on stupid _ prizes
channel.description: Recent content in Corporate on stupid _ prizes

item.title: Mapping .Net Environments with RollerCoaster
item.description: – VIEW DEMO SITE – The Problem Because it’s difficult to explain the complexities of software configuration to those who don’t need to understand it from the “city” perspective, but only see the “house” they are building; or to management who has little to know knowledge of “how the sausage is made”, and why configuration as code takes time. And, It’s not always as simple as a few text files with key values.

item.title: Mindbody-API-Golang
item.description: This is a wrapper around the SOAP API XML contracts available to Mindbody API partners, written in Go. Getting Started Install packages for each service you wish to use go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/siteservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/staffservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/clientservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/classservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/saleservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/Mindbody-API-Golang/appointmentservice" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/wsdl2go" go get -u "github.com/vacoj/wsdl2go/soap" Follow this pattern to make requests and parse calls func makeGetSitesCall() { cli := soap.
